animeTitle: Armored Trooper Votoms: The Last Red Shoulder
otherNames: 装甲騎兵ボトムズ　ザ・ラストレッドショルダー
synopsis: Chirico Cuvie is reunited with others from the Red Shoulder unit as they pursue their revenge against Yoran Pailsen. Unknown to them, Yoran and his group have created the Perfect Soldier, Ypsilon.
